abstract: Stocks fall and oil prices continue to slide amid investor uncertainty over when Federal Reserve will raise interest rates.
lead_paragraph: Stocks were mixed as oil prices continued to slump and investors waited for clues from the Federal Reserve about when it might raise interest rates.

headline.main: Market Closes Mostly Lower a Day Before the Fed’s Statement
headline.print_headline: Shares Mixed After Monday’s Rally as Investors Wait for Word From Fed

snippet: Stocks were mixed as oil prices continued to slump and investors waited for clues from the Federal Reserve about when it might raise interest rates.
